title: Fish Bone Piranha Stainless Steel Knotless Rope and Gear Ties – Lightweight Backpacking or Camping Parachute Cord Tiedown & Bottle Opener – Stainless Steel and Titanium Options
features: ADVENTURE BETTER: The Fish Bone Piranha Knotless is a heavy duty no-knots tightener designed for paracord, but compatible with all types of cord and rope. With a low profile and compact, portable size, the Piranha holds secure and tight with just a few simple wraps.

A PRACTICAL, CONVENIENT SOLUTION: Smooth, non-serrated edges keep your Piranha from catching on other gear while in use. The fish eye doubles as a quick release so you can undo your tie as easily as you set it up. Everyone, even kids, can get the hang of it!

MAKE LIFE EASY ON YOURSELF: You’ll never struggle with a stubborn knot in your paracord again. The no-knot tech of Piranha keeps your nylon cord’s flexible elasticity from stretching into impossibly tight knots. Already have a trusty favorite rope? No sweat: switch out our cord for anything 5/32” and below.

MULTIPURPOSE APPLICATIONS: Every outdoor enthusiast and traveler can streamline their adventures with the multi-functional Piranha. Use it during camping, hiking, rock climbing, fishing, and backpacking trips for splicing, hanging lights, adding extra gear to your pack or luggage, stringing a clothesline, guy line, or hammock, pitching a tent or tarp shelter, and more— it’s a universal tool, and even opens bottles!

USA-MADE QUALITY: We manufacture each veteran designed Piranha here in the USA, and every piece is stress tested up to 135 pounds. We’re proud to offer meticulous engineering and premium quality materials for a finished product you can rely on.
description: The Fish Bone Piranha Knotless Gear Tie is a heavy duty no-knots tightener designed for paracord, but compatible with all types of cord and rope. With a low profile and compact, portable size, the Piranha holds secure and tight with just a few simple wraps. Smooth, non-serrated edges keep your Piranha from catching on other gear while in use. The fish eye doubles as a quick release so you can undo your tie as easily as you set it up. Everyone, even kids, can get the hang of it!  You’ll never struggle with a stubborn knot in your paracord again. The no-knot tech of the Piranha keeps your nylon cord’s flexible elasticity from stretching into impossibly tight knots. Already have a trusty favorite rope? No sweat: switch out our cord for anything 5/32” and below.  Every outdoor enthusiast and traveler can streamline their adventures with the multi-functional Piranha.
